template.name: service
template.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd"> <mapper namespace="${packageName}.${moduleName}.mapper.${ClassName}Mapper"> <sql id="Base_Column_List"> <#list table.allFields as c><#if c_has_next>${c.dbName},</#if><#if !c_has_next>${c.dbName}</#if></#list> </sql> <select id='findAll' resultMap='${ClassName}' > SELECT <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} </select> <select id='countAll' resultType='java.lang.Long' > SELECT count(1) FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} </select> <select id='pageList' resultMap='${ClassName}' > SELECT <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} limit ${"#"}{index},${"#"}{pageSize} </select> <select id='findById' resultMap='${ClassName}' > SELECT <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} WHERE <#list table.keyFields as c><#if c_has_next>${c.dbName}= ${"#"}{${c.javaName}} AND </#if><#if !c_has_next>${c.dbName}= ${"#"}{${c.javaName}}</#if></#list> </select> <select id='exist' resultType='java.lang.Integer' parameterType='${packageName}.${moduleName}.entity.${ClassName}'> SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} WHERE <#list table.keyFields as c><#if c_has_next>${c.dbName}= ${"#"}{${c.javaName}} AND </#if><#if !c_has_next>${c.dbName}= ${"#"}{${c.javaName}}</#if></#list> </select>
<#list table.keyFields as c1> <select id='findBy${c1.javaFieldName}' resultMap='${ClassName}' parameterType='${c1.javaCompleteType}'> SELECT <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} WHERE ${c1.dbName} = ${"#"}{value} </select> <select id='findBy${c1.javaFieldName}s' parameterType='java.util.Set'> SELECT <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} WHERE <choose> <when test='ids !=null and ids.size()>0'> ${c1.dbName} IN <foreach item = 'id' index='index' collection='ids' open='(' separator=',' close=')'> ${"#"}{id} </foreach> </when> <otherwise> 0 = 1 </otherwise> </choose> </select> </#list>
<insert id='save' parameterType='${packageName}.${moduleName}.entity.${ClassName}'> INSERT INTO ${databaseName}.${table.dbName}( <#list table.allFields as c><#if c_has_next>${c.dbName},</#if><#if !c_has_next>${c.dbName}</#if></#list>) VALUES(<#list table.allFields as c><#if c_has_next>${"#"}{${c.javaName}},</#if><#if !c_has_next>${"#"}{${c.javaName}}</#if> </#list>) </insert> <update id='update' parameterType='${packageName}.${moduleName}.entity.${ClassName}'> UPDATE ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} SET <#list table.fields as c> <#if c_has_next>${c.dbName}=${"#"}{${c.javaName}},</#if> <#if !c_has_next>${c.dbName}=${"#"}{${c.javaName}}</#if></#list> WHERE <#list table.keyFields as c><#if c_has_next>${c.dbName}= ${"#"}{${c.javaName}} AND </#if><#if !c_has_next>${c.dbName}= ${"#"}{${c.javaName}}</#if></#list> </update> <update id='updateNotNull' parameterType='${packageName}.${moduleName}.entity.${ClassName}'> UPDATE ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} <trim prefix="SET" suffixOverrides=","> <#list table.fields as c> <if test='null != ${c.javaName}'> ${c.dbName}=${"#"}{${c.javaName}}, </if> </#list> </trim> WHERE <trim prefix="" suffixOverrides=" AND "> <#list table.keyFields as c1> <if test='1 == 1'> ${c1.dbName}=${"#"}{${c1.javaName}} </if> </#list> </trim> </update> <#list table.keyFields as c1> <delete id='deleteBy${c1.javaFieldName}' parameterType='${c1.javaCompleteType}'> DELETE FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} WHERE ${c1.dbName} = ${"#"}{value} </delete> </#list> <!-- ${"#"}{value} --> <#list table.keyFields as c1> <delete id='deleteBy${c1.javaFieldName}s' parameterType='java.util.Set'> DELETE FROM ${databaseName}.${table.dbName} WHERE <choose> <when test='ids !=null and ids.size()>0'> ${c1.dbName} IN <foreach item = 'id' index='index' collection='ids' open='(' separator=',' close=')'> ${"#"}{id} </foreach> </when> <otherwise> 0 = 1 </otherwise> </choose> </delete> </#list> <resultMap type='${packageName}.${moduleName}.entity.${ClassName}' id='${ClassName}'> <#list table.keyFields as c> <result property='${c.javaName}' column='${c.dbName}'/> </#list> <#list table.fields as c> <result property='${c.javaName}' column='${c.dbName}'/> </#list> </resultMap> </mapper>
